    A minimal example

    Function reference

    All functions

    detect_equal()
    Detect Presence/Absence Based on Equal Probability
    effort_basic()
    Generate Sampling Effort Points
    export_df()
    Export Simulation Report Data Frame
    report_equal()
    Report Detections Based on Reporting Probability
    sim_detect()
    Defines detection using a custom function
    sim_effort()
    Defines effort using a built-in function, a custom function, or sf POINTS
    sim_report()
    Defines reporting using a custom function
    sim_state_env()
    Define the state of the environment
    sim_state_target_realise()
    Realizes the State Target into Binary or Abundance
    sim_state_target_suitability()
    Determine the Target Suitability from the State Environment
    state_env_gradient()
    Create a Gradient SpatRaster for Environmental State
    state_env_uniform()
    Create a Uniform SpatRaster for Environmental State
    state_target_realise_binomial()
    Realize Target Suitability Using Binomial Distribution
    state_target_realise_threshold()
    Realize Target Suitability Using Threshold
    state_target_suitability_uniform()
    Create a Uniform Suitability SpatRaster for Target State
    state_target_suitability_virtsp()
    Create Virtual Species Suitability SpatRaster for Target State
